sentences.en: ‘Why can’t I go?’ ‘Because you’re not old enough.’
sentences.cn: “我为什么不能去？”“因为你年纪太小。”

sentences.en: Because of the slump in domestic demand, production has stopped.
sentences.cn: 由于国内需求大幅下降，生产已经停止。

sentences.en: Don't try and double-cross me, Taylor, because I'll kill you.
sentences.cn: 别跟我耍花招，泰勒，要不我会杀了你。

sentences.en: He had to cancel some engagements because of tiredness.
sentences.cn: 他太累了，不得不取消一些约会。

sentences.en: He is called Mitch, because his name is Mitchell.
sentences.cn: 人们叫他米奇，因为他大名叫米切尔。

sentences.en: Hubert never experienced any fear, and this was partly because he was not particularly intelligent.
sentences.cn: 休伯特从来都没有害怕的感觉，部分原因是他这人不大聪明。

sentences.en: I decided to go with them, mainly because I had nothing better to do.
sentences.cn: 我决定和他们一起去，主要是因为我没有更好的事情可做。

sentences.en: I get very nervous because I'm using a lot of expensive equipment.
sentences.cn: 因为正在使用很多昂贵的设备，所以我非常紧张。

sentences.en: I thought they were laughing at me because I was ugly.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他们嘲笑我是因为我长得丑。

sentences.en: Many exam candidates lose marks simply because they do not read the questions properly.
sentences.cn: 许多应试者失分只是因为没有好好地读题。

sentences.en: None of that matters, because we're crazy about each other.
sentences.cn: 那些都不重要，因为我们深深地爱着对方。

sentences.en: The landlord refused to serve him because he considered him too drunk.
sentences.cn: 酒吧老板觉得他已经喝多了，拒绝再给他添酒。

sentences.en: The man was known to the police because of previous convictions.
sentences.cn: 因为有犯罪前科，警察们都认识这个人。

sentences.en: They actually moved down from upstairs because the rent's that expensive.
sentences.cn: 他们确实从楼上搬到了楼下，因为房租太贵了。

sentences.en: they moved here because of the baby.
sentences.cn: 他们为了孩子而搬家到这里。

sentences.en: Tony didn't notice because he was too engrossed in his work.
sentences.cn: 托尼因为太专注于自己的工作而毫未察觉。

sentences.en: Town gardens are ideal because they produce flowers nearly all year round.
sentences.cn: 城市公园是理想去处，那里几乎一年四季鲜花盛开。

sentences.en: Universities are facing grave problems because of diminishing resources.
sentences.cn: 由于资源的减少，大学正面临严峻的问题。

sentences.en: We didn’t enjoy the day because the weather was so awful.
sentences.cn: 那天我们很不尽兴，因为天气实在太糟。

sentences.en: We have been successful because we are offering a quality service.
sentences.cn: 我们因提供的服务水准一流一直经营得很成功。

sentences.en: We were not able to meet the deadline because of manufacturing delays.
sentences.cn: 因为制造方面的延误，我们没能赶上最后期限。
